Founder & CEO, VideoBloom Inc.

Antoine Toffa founded VideoBloom with the single vision to create a leader in turnkey, end-to-end online video advertising and distribution solutions.

Antoine was Founder and CEO of Trip.com, one of the first large online travel companies, for which the Interactive Travel Report named him â€œMan of the Year in the Travel Industryâ€. In 2000, Galileo acquired Trip.com for $326 million (Trip.com is now part of Orbitz). A successful serial entrepreneur, Antoine also founded TamTam, Inc., an online software company that assisted hundreds of worldwide enterprises with their sourcing plans and international expansion.

Previous to his entrepreneurial endeavors, Antoine was consecutively Associate Director of Corporate Strategy, Director of Multimedia Strategy, and General Manager of Interactive Services with the telecommunications company USWest/ MediaOne. He also consulted for Time Warnerâ€™s Interactive Group in multimedia and digital production, as well as with Matra-Communications on the French Minitel, the worldâ€™s first network-based interactive platform.

Antoine completed his undergraduate studies in Mathematics and Physics in Paris, France. He received a graduate degree in Economics from the French Grande Ecole des Hautes Etudes Commerciales (HEC) and a MBA from Harvard Business School.
